BIO

I am a graduate of Bachelor of Science in Business Administration, major in Marketing Management. Prior to coding, I worked as a Data Analyst and as an Email Support Representative in two of the companies I've been with before. Until the last quarter of 2016, I had no idea about coding. I took a bootcamp on fullstack web development, and since then, I have been so passionate about the web.
